overview: Ram√≥n (El Don) is a veteran contract killer who lives tormented due to his age in comparison with his young girlfriend. (Carmen) a married woman with children, a housewife suspects that her husband (Enrique) is unfaithful and hires a private detective (Sebastian) to confirm it. (Agustin) a country man goes to the city and decides to rescue his daughter (Vanessa) from her husband (Armando), a dangerous criminal. Everyone will end up intertwining their stories and losing control of themselves.
title: Celopatas
